name: Lumber Tracks
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 50 - "Delay the Inevitable"

Try and stop and out of control train from hitting an innocent village, as a lumberjack, you must chop down trees in front of the train to get it to slow down!

All code, art and music were made during the jam by myself. The font is Rainyhearts by Camellina.
